mapper.insert: insert into record ( id, title, content, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user )values ( #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser} )
mapper.select: select id,title,content from record where delete_flag = 0 order by update_time desc
mapper.update: update record set delete_flag = 1 where id = #{id}
